channel.title: Openshift on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in Openshift on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: eg-universal-agent-operator
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for Kubernetes installation of eG Universal agent Operator

  • https://eginnovations.github.io/eg-universal-agent-operator-helm

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
eg-universal-agent-operator-cert-manager cert-manager ✅ — 53 1 Critical
eg-universal-agent-operator-cert-manager-cainjector cert-manager ✅ — 10 1 Critical
eginnovations-operator-controller-manager egagent ❌ — 45 1 Critical
eg-universal-agent-operator-cert-manager-webhook cert-manager ✅ — 3 1 Medium
eg-universal-agent-operator-cert-manager-startupapicheck cert-manager ✅ — 1 1 Low

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

item.title: gitlab-operator
item.description:
Description

The GitLab operator aims to manage the full lifecycle of GitLab instances in your Kubernetes or Openshift container platforms.

  • https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/cloud-native/gitlab-operator

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
gitlab-manager default ❌ — 30 1 Critical
gitlab-nginx-ingress default ❌ — 25 0 Critical
gitlab-operator-cert-manager default ✅ — 61 1 Critical
gitlab-operator-cert-manager-cainjector default ✅ — 14 1 Critical
gitlab-prometheus-server default ❌ — 12 0 High
gitlab-operator-cert-manager-webhook default ✅ — 3 1 Medium
gitlab-app-nonroot default ❌ — 1 0 Low
gitlab-operator-cert-manager-startupapicheck default ✅ — 1 1 Low

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.
